Live Version

An insurance system for your precious work !

Download     GitHub

Personal

Live Version (LV) is made for your own personal use.

Automatic

Once you setup LV for a specific folder, the versioning is alive. There is no manual labor involved in maintaining the Live Repository.

Backup

It is a backup system, a separate folder contains Live Repository. It does not in any way manipulate your source folder.

Timeline

LV maintains a timeline for you. You can use LV to track how much time you spent on a recent work.
